content: this project will teach you to create a square-ish washcloth the more consistent you are with your gauge and stitches the closer to square it will be but if it s not totally square don t worry practice makes perfect and one skein of the recommended yarn will make at least three 6 in square washcloths this pattern is written using standard crochet terminology while the stitch sequence is easy to memorize try to get used to reading and referring to your pattern as this will help you when you work on more complicated projects in the future
